price: Na hao walikwisha wapoteza wengi, wala usiwazidishie walio dhulumu ila kupotea.
arabic: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا
footnotes: Na miungu hii iliwapoteza watu wengi. Na wala huwazidishii wenye kuzidhulumu nafsi zao kwa ukafiri na inda, ili kuzidi kubaidika na Haki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqad aḍallū kathīran walā tazidi al-ẓālimīna illā ḍalālan
